      • addCreator

        public static void addCreator(RouterMapCreator creator)

        Add a RouterMapCreator who contains some route rules to be used. this method could be invoked multiple-times. so that you can put multiple route rules from difference modules

        参数:
        creator - RouterMapCreator

      • registerExecutors

        public static void registerExecutors(java.lang.Class<? extends java.util.concurrent.Executor> key,
                                     java.util.concurrent.Executor value)
        To register an Executor to be used.
        参数:
        key - The class of Executor
        value - The Executor instance associate with the key.
